org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanproduct.domain

Class LoanProduct

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.AbstractPersistable<java.lang.Long>
      • org.apache.fineract.portfolio.loanproduct.domain.LoanProduct
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.springframework.data.domain.Persistable<java.lang.Long>

    @Entity
public class LoanProduct
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.AbstractPersistable<java.lang.Long>
    Loan products allow for categorisation of an organisations loans into something meaningful to them. They provide a means of simplifying creation/maintenance of loans. They can also allow for product comparison to take place when reporting. They allow for constraints to be added at product level.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
